channel.title: How to add command menu
channel.description:
i wanta know how to add a command menu like when u do ::commands it will show u all the commands
how do i do that
i have team viewer if u want to help me on that
thx for help :P

item.title: How to add command menu
item.dc:creator: @Chiizu95 Chiizu95
item.description:
@Chiizu95 wrote:

Usualy people do somthing like

if(command.equalsIgnoreCase("commands") && (playerRights >= 0)) { String name = command.substring(5); sendQuest("@dre@Commands", 8144); //Title sendQuest("These are the basic Commands!", 8145); clearQuestInterface(); sendQuest("Command Here", 8148); sendQuest("Command Here", 8149); sendQuest("Command Here", 8150); sendQuest("Command Here", 8151); sendQuest("Command Here", 8152); sendQuest("Command Here", 8153); sendQuest("Command Here", 8154); sendQuest("Command Here", 8155); sendQuest("Command Here", 8156); sendQuest("Command Here", 8157); sendQuest("Command Here", 8158); sendQuest("Command Here", 8159); sendQuest("Command Here", 8160); sendQuest("Command Here", 8161); sendQuest("Command Here", 8162); sendQuestSomething(8143); showInterface(8134); flushOutStream(); sM("Make good use of these commands"); }

Read full topic
